paper_abstract: In the current paper, we prove the 11-total choosability of planar graphs with maximum degree Delta <= 8, the (Delta + 1)-total choosability of 5-cycle-free planar graphs with maximum degree Delta >= 8, the 5-total choosability of graphs with maximum degree Delta = 4 and maximum average degree mad < 3, and the 4-total choosability of subcubic graphs with maximum average degree mad < 9/4. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the total choosability of planar graphs and of sparse graphs
